files.help:
Set this in your zshenv:

```bash
SHELL_SESSIONS_DISABLE=1
```

Should only exist on macOS when using the default terminal.

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
zstyle ':completion:*' cache-path "$XDG_CACHE_HOME"/zsh/zcompcache
```

You must manually create the _$XDG_CACHE_HOME/zsh_ directory if it doesn't exist yet.

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
compinit -d "$XDG_CACHE_HOME"/zsh/zcompdump-"$ZSH_VERSION"
```

You must manually create the _$XDG_CACHE_HOME/zsh_ directory if it doesn't exist yet.

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
export HISTFILE="$XDG_STATE_HOME"/zsh/history
```

You must manually create the _$XDG_STATE_HOME/zsh_ directory if it doesn't exist yet.

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
export HISTFILE="$XDG_STATE_HOME"/zsh/history
```

You must manually create the _$XDG_STATE_HOME/zsh_ directory if it doesn't exist yet.

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
export HISTFILE="$XDG_STATE_HOME"/zsh/history
```

You must manually create the _$XDG_STATE_HOME/zsh_ directory if it doesn't exist yet.

Move the file to _"$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/zsh/.zlogin_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zshenv_ (Or _/etc/zsh/zshenv_, on some distros).

Move the file to _"$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/zsh/.zprofile_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zshenv_ (Or _/etc/zsh/zshenv_, on some distros).

Move the file to _"$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/zsh/.zshenv_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zshenv_ (Or _/etc/zsh/zshenv_, on some distros).

Move the file to _"$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/zsh/.zshrc_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zshenv_ (Or _/etc/zsh/zshenv_, on some distros).
